title: [HOLD for payment 2023-11-09] [$500] mWeb/Safari- Chat - After tapping on "Copy to clipboard", options menu does not close
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to any chat
2. Long press on any message
3. Tap on "Copy to clipboard"

Expected result: There should be a message indicating the message has been copied and then the options menu should close

Actual result: None
